State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fixes an issue where Armor Penetration stats persist, after unequipping a weapon with armor penetration and prevents it from overwriting itself with wrong values.
State.Name: Armor Penetration Bug Fix

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lore friendly and in keeping with the games visual style.
State.Name: Frame Job - A Power Armor frame Retexture

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Makes Fallout less annoying to play by fixing bugged perks, making underused perks viable and automating low skill actions.
State.Name: Perk Up - Full Vanilla Plus perk Overhaul

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: ossumpossum
State.Description: Flags water at the Weston Water Treatment Plant with IsFullLOD so it is visible and no longer pops in.
State.Name: Weston Water LOD Fix

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: moTechPlz
State.Description: Replaces ingame notes with prettier ones.
State.Name: Better Notes

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

Original.Name: No More Power Armor Battery Pathing-33080-1-0.7z

State.Author: John Doe Bowler
State.Description: Removes the forced loss of control / buggy pathing that happens every time you insert a Fusion Core in a Power Armor.
State.Name: No PA Battery Pathing

State.Author: Aigni
State.Description:
Fixes all bugs/problems of 21:9 resolutions and is fully compatible to FallUI, DEF_UI, Horizon, HUDFramework, etc.

Tested resolutions: 3440×1440 and 2560 × 1080.
State.Name: Ultra Wide Interface (21x9)

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: MunkySpunk
State.Description: The hottest mod from GTA: San Andreas makes its way to Fallout 4... In name. Adds animated steam to the coffee mugs, noodle bowls, and brahmin steaks used in NPC animations.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Hot Coffee

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Adds missing LODs for objects that don't currently have them. This improves visuals and eliminates pop-in of objects at no performance cost. Seriously no performance cost. See the compares yourself.
State.Name: Far Object LOD Improvement Project

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A lightweight but fully featured mod list. Built for Wabbajack installation.
State.Name: FUSION - A Fallout modlist

State.Author: Trsdib
State.Description: The mod is a pack of LOD textures made by hand from in-game models.
State.Name: Just New Lods

State.Author: doodlez Kaldaien
State.Description: F4SE plugin which can more than halve render latency.
State.Name: NVIDIA Reflex Support

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: doswillrule
State.Description: You can't stop the press! POE brings Diamond City's newspaper to life with 14,000 words of new articles for 22 quests, multiple outcomes, improved textures and support for magazine racks.
State.Name: Publick Occurrences Expanded

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Simple wait anywhere via hotkey (Lightweight mod)
State.Name: Simple Wait Anywhere (Lightweight)

Original.Name: FIS - The NEW FallUI Item Sorter-60580-2-1-1654350813.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The official new Item Sorter for the FallUI mods. Features auto-tagging, MCM-configurable categories and variations, many tags/icon, clear arranged overview and more!
State.Name: FIS - The NEW FallUI Item Sorter

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Fixes the oversized Nuka World bottles in a clean, simple, and mod-compatible way.
State.Name: Clean And Simple Nuka World Bottle Fix

State.Author: Rpgrobot
State.Description: Edits audio of power armor to sound more mechanical
State.Name: Under the Hood- Mechanical Power Armor Audio

Original.Name: Vanilla Green House Roof Rain Stop-58536-1-0-1646251609.7z

State.Author: Husakron
State.Description: This mod endeavors to replace the Meshes and Materials for the vanilla glass roofs as well as some of the mods here on Nexus that add glass roofs.  The new glass roofs stop the rain and *snow.
State.Name: Glass Roofs Stop Rain and Snow - Various Mod Patches

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Knocked down in combat? And get up like a sloth?  No! Be a soldier!
State.Name: Faster Getup

State.Author: Moogletron
State.Description: Run into dead things and they get pushed.
State.Name: Corpse Collision

State.Author: persephonecharming
State.Description: Tired of your companions chasing after innocent radstags who aren't even attacking you? This mod stops that!
State.Name: Docile Radstags

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Subtly improves the vanilla Hazmat Suit by tweaking certain features and visuals.
State.Name: Hazmat Suit Improved

Original.Name: Legendary Mutation Messages Fix - Cut Content Restored-63929-1-1-1662876171.zip

State.Author: Crash
State.Description: A small fix to restore unique messages when legendary enemies mutate.
State.Name: Legendary Mutation Messages Fix - Cut Content Restored

State.Author: PK0
State.Description: Enable the rotation of the Player when opening looksmenu (F4SE Plugin).
State.Name: Looksmenu Player Rotation

State.Author: steamcanuck
State.Description: Simple script edit to prevent the Nuka-World main quest from running without either visiting the Nuka-World Transit Station or listening to the radio station.
State.Name: No Quest Autostart - Nuka World

State.Author: LLX
State.Description: Makes Radio Freedom a Recruitment Beacon
State.Name: Recruiter Radio Freedom

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lore friendly and in keeping with the games visual style.
State.Name: Base Face - A face retexture

Original.Name: Tesla gun projectiles create visual effect on impact-51994-1-1-1621749629.zip

State.Author: Me
State.Description: Vanilla lightning beams did not produce any visual effect or decal(bullet holes) on impact. This mod fixes that.
State.Name: UNLIMITED POWER - Tesla Rifle projectiles create visual effect on impact

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Rebuilds the vanilla tree LOD branch textures from their full resolution textures.
State.Name: Optimized Vanilla Tree LODs

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Faster Workshop is an F4SE plugin that optimizes workshop loading times by replacing some of the most expensive and inefficient regions of workshop loading code with far more efficient versions. Also provides a hotkey to instantly enter Workshop mode and fixes workshop icon load lag.
State.Name: Faster Workshop (Workshop Lag Fix)

State.Author: Rcoll
State.Description: Settlement attacks will no longer be left to chance. Gain the ability to guarantee that your settlement will always win with a high enough defence stat.
State.Name: This Settlement Does Not Need Your Help - BS Defence Redone

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Monitors your save file for data loss and warns you when you load the game, so you can avoid wasting time playing on a busted save and roll back immediately.
State.Name: Canary Save File Monitor

State.Author: Crimsomrider
State.Description: This mod does several things. It fixes Bethesda's mistakes (female used the male hood mesh), it optimizes the mesh completely (allows you to retexture the outfit without retexturing the transparent glass), makes the glass transparent and removes all the unnecessary armor slots so you can wear other accessories or hats/armor with it.
State.Name: Fixed and Optimized Transparent Institute Cleanroom Suit

State.Author: PK0
State.Description: Sets the distance of the shadows dynamically (F4SE)
State.Name: Shadow Boost FO4

State.Author: SparrowPrince
State.Description: WET enhances all water and most water-related effects in the game. From one of the creators of the popular Realistic Water Two mod for Skyrim.
State.Name: WET - Water Enhancement Textures

State.Author: BouncySpartan68
State.Description: Changes one of the game's scripts to fix the "1 Rad bug" where doctors and/or decontamination arches don't properly remove all your radiation.
State.Name: 1 Rad Bugfix

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Adds 3d Trees LOD models for Far Harbor.
State.Name: Far Harbor 3D Tree LODs

State.Author: TheLich
State.Description: Place/build objects in settlements everywhere you want, change objects whatever you like. No more RED!
State.Name: Place Everywhere

State.Author: c
State.Description: Live Action Handy support for missing eyes.
State.Name: Live Action Last Two

State.Author: Old Nick
State.Description:
Prevents the Berry Mentats effect from highlighting your current companion and disables the effect entirely while your weapon is holstered or you are in dialogue.



Also includes the fix to stop the effect from turning certain neutral NPCs hostile.
State.Name: Less Annoying Berry Mentats

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description:
Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

Don't expect big changes since I want this to be as much compatible as possible and to let users choose their own sound mods. If you want to help and/or advice of better ways, please let me know.
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks

State.Author: steamcanuck
State.Description: This mod prevents the quest 'Vault-Tec Calling' from automatically updating and beginning officially until you either A) listen to the Vault 88 emergency broadcast or B) Enter the Vault 88 cell--as in, go inside.
State.Name: No Quest Autostart - Vault-Tec

State.Author: kumagabear
State.Description: Fix reload speed for various actions
State.Name: Reload Speed Fix Workshop

Original.Name: The Eyes of Beauty - SHJ Edit-61856-1-4-1657978448.zip

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Full edit and fixes for the fantastic Eyes of Beauty mod. All vanilla textures covered, including support for ghouls.
State.Name: The Eyes Of Beauty - SHJ Edit

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: steamcanuck
State.Description: Prevents "Fire Support" from beginning without the player listening to Haylen's radio message.
State.Name: No Quest Autostart - BoS Fire Support

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: 5 presets of the male default "Nate" from pre war Soldier to wasteland survivor.
State.Name: The Many Faces Of Nate

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: pauderek
State.Description: Lowers your weapon automatically when not in combat
State.Name: Automatically Lowered Weapons

State.Author: HiSaZuL
State.Description: A fix for deaths under cryo effects leaving respawned actors broken. Affects cryolator, legendary effects, criticals and explosives.
State.Name: CryoFix

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod fixes artefacts, pixelation and color banding in textures that are used for special light effects. Zero performance loss, little to nothing strain for your VRAM, no esp needed, no reason to not use it.
State.Name: Fixed Gobo Effects

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A lightweight but fully featured mod list. Built for Wabbajack installation.
State.Name: FUSION - A Fallout modlist

Original.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks - No RAO Replacer-38448-NoRAO4-1-1672415747.zip

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description:
Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

Don't expect big changes since I want this to be as much compatible as possible and to let users choose their own sound mods. If you want to help and/or advice of better ways, please let me know.
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks

State.Author: Jekod
State.Description: You've finally collected that full set for your pool table only to find one problem.  Fixes the size of the pool rack to allow the balls to fit.
State.Name: Pool Rack Fix

State.Author: akir4
State.Description: Small animation tweaks and fixes.
State.Name: Misc anim tweaks and fixes

Original.Name: Capped Out - A loot and levelled list rebalance-62868-1-1-1659547504.7z

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Brings a logical and measured approach to container and NPC levelled lists.
State.Name: Capped Out - A loot and levelled list rebalance

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
You are in the middle of a fire fight, you are near death. You take all the courage you got left and run to the next cover. But then, you get hit. A message box appears. 

"Your health is low! Use a Stimpak, eat some food, or drink some water."

You click ok, then you are dead. You just got killed by the message box.

Let's fix that!
State.Name: Less intrusive tutorial

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod prevents the player comments when clicking on skeletons in Vault 111 from playing more than once.
State.Name: Non-repeating player comments in Vault 111

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: battlebrother13
State.Description:
When a bobby pin breaks in a lock, the next pin will be at the same angle instead of resetting every time. Makes lockpicking less of a hassle without removing the challenge entirely.

Updated version of OnlyIWeDo's mod.
State.Name: Remember Lockpick Angle - Updated

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Vanilla NPC drinking animations are missing sounds and facial animations. This MOD fix this. For a little immersion.
State.Name: NPC Drinking Fix

State.Author: Phlunder
State.Description: Vanilla-friendly retexture of all object LOD resources in the base game and DLCs.
State.Name: HD LOD Textures

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Fixes the old problem with water puddles and blood pools flickering and flashing when looking at them from certain angles.
State.Name: Simple Puddle Reflection Flicker Fix (Water and Blood)

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Make Fallout 4 always take most of CPU usage

Increase FPS and Prevent suddenly lag caused by other processes
State.Name: Fallout Priority - f4se plugin

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: ScottyDoesKnow
State.Description: Removes ammo from guns on corpses and adds it to the corpse's inventory.
State.Name: Remove Ammo from Dropped Guns

Original.Name: Assaultron Left Hand Hydraulic Frame Arm Mesh Bug Fix-44526-v1-0-1587276353.zip

State.Author: Grassanoid
State.Description: Fixed the .nif mesh file for the Assaultron 'Left Hand Hydraulic Frame' armor piece so that the "piston rods on the left arm twist through the forearm" bug won't occur anymore.
State.Name: Assaultron Left Hand Hydraulic Frame Arm Mesh Bug Fix

Original.Name: Cappy in a Haystack Easy Find-24190-1-0.zip

State.Author: Moonracer
State.Description: Quest markers for the hidden Cappy symbols don't disappear when you get close.
State.Name: Cappy in a Haystack Easy Find

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A bunch of small edits to most of the companions in the vanilla style.
State.Name: Curated Companions

State.Author: OverLord of Chaos
State.Description: This mod makes it so that the melee killmoves introduced with the Far Harbor DLC occur less often, so that the older killmoves can be seen more frequently.
State.Name: Far Harbor Melee Killmove Frequency Rebalance

State.Author: HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam  - Edited by Exiled Eye
State.Description: Makes Project Reality Footsteps FO4 by HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam louder.
State.Name: Louder Project Reality Footsteps FO4

State.Author: BenRierimanu
State.Description: Previsibines performance upgrade package for Fallout 4, covering the entire game. Depending on location, could give from 2 FPS to 30+ FPS increase, also includes any relevant bug fixes I can find and fix not already covered by UF4OP. Requires Season Pass / All main DLC.
State.Name: Previsibines Repair Pack

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This mod adds a clock widget to loading menu, main menu and fader menu to display current real time while loading.How much time did you spend on loading?
State.Name: Clock Widget - Show Real Time While Loading

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: added correct PBR data to the Marine Combat Armor, as it lacked it before.
State.Name: Marine Combat Armor Material Fix

State.Author: JDBruce
State.Description: Fixes the VATS freezing bug that occurs in survival mode.
State.Name: VATS Freeze Fix

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Adds lights to load elevators for players who don't like being left in the dark.
State.Name: Otis Repair Services - Lights In Load Elevators

State.Author: sight1
State.Description: Smaller 10mm pistol model, reduced muzzle flash and fixed reflex sights.
State.Name: Resized 10mm Pistol Reworked

Original.Name: Unused Map Markers - Cut Content Restored-64009-1-0-1662387190.zip

State.Author: Crash
State.Description: Restores 50+ map markers that were cut from the game.
State.Name: Unused Map Markers - Cut Content Restored

State.Author: Neagoe
State.Description: Adds the original feet to the Far Harbor marine boots.
State.Name: Far Harbor Marine Armor Boots Fix

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: 5 presets of the female default "Nora" from pre war lawyer to wasteland survivor.
State.Name: The Many Faces Of Nora

Original.Name: Workshop Spotlight Fix with DLC - All in One Installer-11090-v1-0DLC.rar

State.Author: ccmads
State.Description: Fix the workshop spotlight fast travel blackout bug and provide light range and shadow options (DLC wall spotlight is partially fixed)
State.Name: Workshop Spotlight Fix

State.Author: opt33rge
State.Description: Uncommonly when sprinting and barely bumping the edge of certain cars, it will trigger a physics collision and kill you.  Now, if it occurs, it will only wound you about 30-60 health points depending on various game settings.  Does not affect exploding car damage that can still kill you.
State.Name: Car Physics Death bug fix

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A bunch of small edits to most of the companions in the vanilla style.
State.Name: Curated Companions

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: FastStart a new game in less than 2 minutes from Main menu > Looks menu > SPECIAL menu > Outside Vault 111 with most mod added inventory items. This is a scripted bypass, not a static savegame so you get full player customisation and fresh RNG.
State.Name: SKK Fast Start new game

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: Crimsomrider
State.Description:
Adds a woman's touch to multiple outfits in order to properly resemble the 1950s. An era when skirts, legs, stockings, high heels, charm and class were extremely sexy... infact, they still are.



The mod comes in two versions : With stockings and without stockings.
State.Name: 1950's Feminine Outfits (Vanilla - EVB - CBBE)

State.Author: MunkySpunk - Pra - Whisper
State.Description: Replaces all awful vanilla candles with more advanced synchronized animated versions. No broken precombines, no overwritten precombines. All items are scrappable if encountered in workshop.
State.Name: Immersive Candles

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A linear Upgrade path using in game armor components to build the survivors own custom end game armor.
State.Name: Upgradeable Vault Suit

Original.Name: Who's The General - Minutemen Quest Cleanup-59019-1-04-1648414402.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A mod for players who dislike being asked to report back to Preston Garvey.
State.Name: Who's The General - Minutemen Quest Cleanup

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for showing holstered weapons on characters, with various customization options.
State.Name: Classic Holstered Weapons System (CHW)

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

Original.Name: FOV Slider and Player Height - ESL version-36768-1-3-1585132456.zip

State.Author: g0kur
State.Description: Adjust FOVs/PlayerScale with sliders without messing up the Terminal Display and Pipboy.
State.Name: FOV Slider and Player Height

State.Author: Moonracer
State.Description: Better Bloatflies adds the bloatfly larva syringe effect to bloatfly projectiles. If an NPC is hit with a bloatfly projectile and dies within 90 seconds there is a chance their corpse will spawn a new bloatfly. I've also increased the base damage and radiation damage of bloatfly projectiles slightly.
State.Name: Better Bloatflies

State.Author: GenghisKhanX
State.Description: Because you don't make clothes with Chemistry.  Not associated with the popular Crafting Workbenches mod.
State.Name: Chemistry Station Renamed Crafting Workbench

State.Author: C4P0N3
State.Description: Customize your Targeting HUD! Choose when it is active, change its color, highlight friendlies in a different color and more.
State.Name: Customizable Targeting HUD

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lightweight lighting aims to be an all in one simple Vanilla + Lighting overhaul. All while being as compatible as can be with no cell edits.
State.Name: Lightweight Lighting - A weather and interior lighting overhaul

State.Author: DarthWayne
State.Description: This mod solves the old problem of useless fences with large gaps between them by adding snap points to the junk fences and guard towers. This enables you to snap them gapless together. Furthermore you can snap floors as walkways to some of the fences.
State.Name: Snappable Junk Fences

State.Author: Vashdakkari
State.Description: Mashup of the Marine Tactical Helmet and the Marine Helmet, so you can wear the Marine Helmet and have your neck covered. Replaces the Marine Helmet.
State.Name: Marine Helmet with Tactical Hood

State.Author: 4estGimp
State.Description: This mod edits several enemy and combat behaviors for a more challenging experience  It is intended to be lightweight, and highly compatible while still making a noticeable difference.  A Complex Sorter NPC Scaling plugin in also available.
State.Name: 4estGimp - AI Edit and Complex Sorter NPC Scaling

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: CrEaToXx
State.Description: This combines all of my previous snaptastic mesh replacers, allowing for a wide range of additional workshop building snapping convenience...
State.Name: Total Snapgasm

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A tidied up and functional HUD designed for gameplay.
State.Name: FUSION - FallUI Hud Preset

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Combines the effects of Companion Infinite Ammo, No Companion Power Armor Damage, Companions Can Sneak, and No Companion Fall Damage, for vanilla, DLC, and Mod Companions, WITHOUT making any edits to vanilla records and WITHOUT scripts. No overwrites, no conflicts. Now with Increased Companion Accuracy option.
State.Name: Better Companions - No Conflicts

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: For those who dislike extra load screens.
State.Name: Fast Travel From Quest Hubs

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: A F4SE plugin that lets you jump from vertibirds.
State.Name: Vertibird Jump

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: the wetsuit provided with Far harbor lacks any environmental mask(reflective data) in its material file. so i rewrote it to have the correct PBR data.
State.Name: Marine Wet suit Material Fix

State.Author: Degenerate Dak
State.Description: A brand new design to replace the vanilla assault rifle. This time around we get a proper machine gun for the late game.
State.Name: Dak's Assault Rifle Replacer REDUX

Original.Name: Live Action Handy - With Iris and GlowMap - Repack-9571-1-1b.zip

State.Author: Pyrota111000
State.Description: The live action trailer had shown Mr. Handy with lighted eyes so I've added spotlights to Codsworth and all Handy models eyes including Gutsy and Nanny.  Spotlights also included in all Automatron eyes added in the Robot Workbench under Handy Torso.
State.Name: Live Action Mr. Handy - Lights added to Codsworth and all Handy model Robot eyes encountered or created

State.Author: akir4
State.Description: Small animation tweaks and fixes.
State.Name: Misc anim tweaks and fixes

State.Author: Expired6978
State.Description: Adds engine modifications to improve character creation.
State.Name: LooksMenu

State.Author: ashjay101
State.Description: Fully and immersively restores A New Dawn to the Minutemen ending of Fallout 4!
State.Name: A New Dawn - Minutemen BoS Sentinel Cut Content Restored

State.Author: Sranger
State.Description: A modular, non-intrusive vanilla revamp of Companions' thoughts with less repeating dialogue to open more unique dialogue and more variation in the protagonist's questions!
State.Name: Companion Thoughts Overhaul

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: A bug fix and consistency mod.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Fixes

State.Author: PallidaCulus
State.Description: General McGann has been dead for almost 40 years.  He wouldn't look so good.  Now, only a skeleton remains.
State.Name: General McGann is a Skeleton

State.Author: AlpineYJ
State.Description: This mod intends to keep all radiant quests assigned within the commonwealth - in the commonwealth. This means that Scribe Haylen won't be sending you to Far Harbor to retrieve the elusive BoogerTron device, and Mr. Tims won't be sending you to Nuka World to clear out raiders.  The real goal? You don't have to start any DLCs before you
State.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth

State.Author: HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam
State.Description: Changes almost all footstep sounds into more realistic ones. Including subtle gear and backpack rattle. *Snow Edition* available.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FO4

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: A retexture of the subway transit sign. Comes with an installer where you can choose between 1K, 2K and 4K resolution as well as loose and packed files.
State.Name: Subway Transit Sign 4K Texture

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: This mod adds new commands and overhauls existing commands within the console.
State.Name: Console Commands Extender

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Author: Expired6978
State.Description: Simple plugin that modifies all vanilla generators to produce more power (Three flavors)
State.Name: Better Generators

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Audixas
State.Description: Fixes incorrect or missing ownership data assigned to objects and crops.
State.Name: Ownership Fixes

Original.Name: RB Rivet City Renegade - Low Res-46412-1-1595274561.7z

State.Author: radbeetle
State.Description: A new outfit for Danse after the completion of his personal quest. (maybe light spoilers inside.)
State.Name: Rivet City Renegade - Wasteland Gear for Danse

State.Author: AcesofDeath7
State.Description: Fixes Vault 111 Cryo Room 2 & Overseer's Terminals to match Cryopod assignments.
State.Name: Vault 111 Terminals Patch

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Swap the "quest items can't be removed" message with something a little more informative.
State.Name: Whose Quest Is It Anyway

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Known from Skyrim and other games, many vendors are restricted. You can't sell everything to anyone. This also prevents the player from piling up currency. This mod applies several restrictions to several NPCs. For example, a doctor can only buy and sell chem related items. But there are still some stores, where you can dump everything.
State.Name: Complex Vendors

State.Author: Degenerate Dak
State.Description: A much-needed overhaul to the combat rifle. Converts it to 5.56, replaces the receiver mesh, and adds appropriate magazines for each ammo type.
State.Name: Dak's Immersive Combat Rifle Overhaul

State.Author: KATheHuman
State.Description: This mod empowers Bethesda's current genetic system, completely overhauling it.
State.Name: Genetical Father

State.Author: akir4 and Wardaddy
State.Description: Makes the institute and standard laser weapons smaller in the 1st person.
State.Name: Laser weapons 1st person reposition

State.Author: space2jump_and_Kaeltis
State.Description: This is a collection of all of the awesome "Vanilla-DLCs" Settlements by space2jump, converted to be used with Workshop Framework instead of Transfer Settlements.
State.Name: Workshop Framework Settlement Collection - Vanilla-DLCs by space2jump

State.Author: Ea6t
State.Description: Allows encounter zone levels to be recalculated after initial entry.
State.Name: Encounter Zone Recalculation (Continuous Level Scaling)

State.Author: QuietPippin
State.Description: Fixes the head mesh clipping on shorter/shaved/bald hairstyles on Female characters.
State.Name: Female Rear Head Clipping Fix

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Weathers and desaturates all in game paper based posters.
State.Name: Peeling Posters - Weathered paper based signs

State.Author: Seb263
State.Description: This mod fixes this annoying bug that makes the player's and NPCs faces turn brown when reloading a savegame. It is completely transparent, autonomous, has no impact on performance and is compatible with any mods.
State.Name: Rusty Face Fix

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Full balancing of vanilla weapon mods and weapon records where needed.
State.Name: Streamlined Weapons - A vanilla attachment rebalance

State.Author: Zeanzil
State.Description: Alter the max level scaling of npc
State.Name: Tweaked  scaling

State.Author: steamcanuck
State.Description: Prevents the Automatron main quest from automatically starting until the player listens to the Caravan Distress Call.
State.Name: No Quest Autostart - Automatron

Original.Name: Amelia and Honest Dan ESL Flagged Version-46944-1-0-0-1597935254.zip

State.Author: Texashokies
State.Description: Ever wonder where Amelia Stockton and Honest Dan go after Human Error? The answer without this mod is limbo, however with this mod they will show up at Bunker Hill. If Bunker Hill is under your control Amelia and Dan will be settlers that you can command, but not move from Bunker Hill.
State.Name: Amelia and Honest Dan at Bunker Hill

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: A bug fix and consistency mod.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Fixes

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Fallout 4 has hundreds of ambient blue lights placed around glowing blue fungus. This is an interesting idea in concept, but in practice looks terrible. This mod removes all blue fungus lights from the world. and the blue glow map from tree fungus. Green mushrooms and brain fungus will still emit green light and glow if said lights are present.
State.Name: Forest Fungus De-Lit

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Balances the environmental effects on all base game and DLC transparent material files.
State.Name: Gloomy Glass - All transparent materials revised

State.Author: XLSJ
State.Description: Allows bullet holes and other impact effects to be shown at long ranges. Made with FO4Edit.
State.Name: Long Range Bullet Holes

State.Author: McChuggernaut
State.Description: Fixes the unmarked quest in the General Atomics building that breaks if you leave.
State.Name: Quality Assurance Bug Fix

State.Author: SparrowPrince
State.Description: No more elastic waves in the Commonwealth. Brand new effects and textures with a more realistic motion.
State.Name: WAVE - Wave Animation Vanilla Enhanced

State.Author: WhiskyTangoFox
State.Description: Changes how legendary enemies get legendary items to actually make sense.
State.Name: Legendaries They Can Use

State.Author: steamcanuck
State.Description: Prevents "Far From Home" from starting without the player either listening to Ellie's radio message or visiting the Nakano residence.
State.Name: No Quest Autostart - Far Harbor

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person swimming animations. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL available.
State.Name: First-Person Swimming Animations

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Fixes numerous texture sizing, coloration and specular errors, with the help of AI upscaling and other sources from around the Nexus.
State.Name: Targeted Textures - Vanilla textures upscaled fixed and sized

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Overhauls all base game and DLC Billboards to look less saturated and more in keeping with the game.
State.Name: Blasted Billboards - A weathered billboard overhaul

State.Author: jumarbye
State.Description:
More faces! More helmets! Glasses! Swatters! 



A blend of three mods by three different authors (created with their permissions) this mod provides variety to Diamond City guard faces and gear, all under one ESL.



No DLCs needed; all vanilla assets.
State.Name: DC Guard Variations

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: A lightweight vanilla friendly rebalance and QOL tweak for all base game and DLC Power armor.
State.Name: Perennial Power Armor - Lightweight Power Armor Rebalance

State.Author: Random Unit
State.Description: Adds a chance for legendary item to appear in a successfully hacked safe
State.Name: Legendary Items in Safes

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: jimmygitto
State.Description:
Very simple no-esp model replacer for the Chemistry Stations to make them more immersive for crafting everything.



Also with an ESL-flagged ESP option (doesn't count towards your load order limit) which lets you craft the 4 alternate models.
State.Name: Simple Immersive Chem Benches for Crafting

State.Author: FX0x01
State.Description: Allows you to sprint while reloading and vice versa in the 1st person. Makes the shooter component more dynamic than the vanilla game. Does not include any scripts or plugins. Should work for most vanilla and modded weapons.
State.Name: Sprint Reload

State.Author: Jberry0410
State.Description: The grieving raider, a man hurt by the world. Laying his love to rest only to be jacked up and killed by the Sole Survivor, well no more.
State.Name: Grieving Raider - A Most Important Mod

State.Author: Gmoi
State.Description:
A full retexture for the Pipe Gun series, including the pipe revolver and the Syringer. 

Custom cubemaps for new and improved dirty reflections.

The recon scope is also thrown in as a bonus.
State.Name: Scrap metal and makeshift welds - A Pipe Gun Retexture

State.Author: Shadai
State.Description: Simple mod that fixes the size of the vapor and drip effects when starting a new game.
State.Name: Bathroom Effects Fix

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Fixes the animation data in the Duffle Bag so it plays the open/close sounds it's supposed to.
State.Name: Duffle Bag Sound Fix

Original.Name: LOD Terrain Noise and Detail Normals-56138-1-0-1638704425.7z

State.Description: Vanilla-friendly retexture of all object LOD resources in the base game and DLCs.
